title: Baklava
description: Layers of filo pastry filled with chopped nuts and sweetened with syrup or honey.
author: Mehmet Yılmaz
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
Layer filo pastry in a baking dish, brushing each sheet with butter.
Sprinkle chopped nuts between every few layers.
Cut into diamond shapes before baking.
Bake for 45 minutes until golden.
Make syrup with sugar, water, honey, and lemon juice; pour over hot baklava.

title: Menemen
description: A traditional Turkish breakfast dish of eggs scrambled with tomatoes, peppers, and spices.
author: Ayla Demir
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan.
Add peppers and sauté until soft.
Add tomatoes, cook until slightly thickened.
Crack in eggs and stir until softly scrambled.
Season with salt and pepper, serve with bread.

title: İskender Kebab
description: Thinly sliced doner meat served over pita bread with tomato sauce and yogurt.
author: Ahmet Kaya
instructions: Warm pita bread and cut into cubes.
Heat tomato sauce and season with salt.
Arrange pita on a plate, top with meat and tomato sauce.
Melt butter and drizzle over.
Serve with yogurt on the side.

title: Tiramisu
description: Classic Italian dessert made with coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream.
author: Giovanni Rossi
instructions: Separate egg yolks and whites.
Whisk yolks with sugar until pale, add mascarpone.
Whisk whites to stiff peaks and fold in.
Dip ladyfingers in coffee and layer with cream.
Dust with cocoa powder and chill for 4 hours.

title: Fettuccine Alfredo
description: Creamy pasta dish made with butter, cream, and Parmesan cheese.
author: Maria Bianchi
instructions: Cook pasta until al dente.
Melt butter in a pan, add cream and simmer.
Add Parmesan, stir until smooth.
Toss pasta in sauce, season with salt and pepper.

title: Caprese Salad
description: Simple salad of tomatoes, mozzarella, and fresh basil with olive oil.
author: Luca Romano
instructions: Arrange tomato and mozzarella slices on a plate.
Tuck basil leaves between slices.
Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.

title: Sushi Rolls
description: Japanese rolled sushi with rice, nori, and various fillings.
author: Hiroshi Tanaka
instructions: Cook sushi rice and season with rice vinegar.
Place nori on bamboo mat, spread rice evenly.
Add fillings, roll tightly, slice into pieces.
Serve with soy sauce and wasabi.

title: Chicken Teriyaki
description: Grilled chicken glazed with sweet and savory teriyaki sauce.
author: Akira Suzuki
instructions: Mix soy sauce, mirin, sugar, and sake for sauce.
Grill chicken until nearly done, brush with sauce.
Cook until glaze is sticky and chicken is cooked.

title: Matcha Cheesecake
description: Baked cheesecake flavored with Japanese matcha green tea.
author: Yuki Nakamura
instructions: Mix cream cheese and sugar until smooth.
Add eggs, cream, and matcha powder.
Pour over biscuit base in pan.
Bake at 160°C for 45 minutes.

title: Kung Pao Chicken
description: Spicy Chinese stir-fry with chicken, peanuts, and vegetables.
author: Li Wei
instructions: Stir-fry chicken until golden.
Add garlic, chili paste, and pepper.
Stir in soy sauce and peanuts, cook for 2 minutes.

title: Sweet and Sour Pork
description: Crispy pork pieces in a tangy sweet and sour sauce.
author: Chen Yu
instructions: Coat pork in flour and fry until crispy.
Stir-fry peppers, pineapple, and sauce.
Add pork, toss to coat.

title: Spring Rolls
description: Crispy rolls filled with vegetables and sometimes meat.
author: Wang Mei
instructions: Stir-fry vegetables with soy sauce.
Place filling on wrappers, roll tightly.
Fry until golden and crispy.

title: Paella Valenciana
description: Traditional Spanish rice dish with seafood, chicken, and vegetables.
author: Carlos Martinez
instructions: Sauté chicken and vegetables.
Add rice, saffron, and stock.
Arrange seafood on top, cook until rice is done.

title: Churros with Chocolate
description: Fried dough pastry dusted with sugar and served with thick chocolate sauce.
author: Isabella Lopez
instructions: Boil water, sugar, salt, and oil.
Stir in flour to form dough.
Pipe into hot oil, fry until golden.
Dust with sugar and cinnamon, serve with chocolate sauce.

title: Spanish Omelette (Tortilla Española)
description: Thick omelette with potatoes and onions.
author: Miguel Garcia
instructions: Fry potatoes and onions in olive oil until soft.
Beat eggs, add cooked potatoes and onions.
Pour mixture into pan, cook until set.
